system.description: You have trained in the use of a specific group of pistol weapons, mastering their handling and accuracy.
system.notes: Choose weapon group: Primitive, Universal (Bolt, Las, Launcher, Melta, Plasma, SP), or other pistol type
system.benefit: Can use Pistol Weapons of relevant group without -20 penalty to BS. Such as: Primitive, Universal (Bolt, Las, Launcher, Melta, Plasma, and SP).

specialAbilities.name: Weapon Group Training
specialAbilities.description: You can use pistol weapons of the chosen group without the -20 untrained penalty.
